release.description: This release of the Core Library is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added in 1100 version of the schema and schematron and set as default for this release. Inherited from core.
Added the capability to generate reports in XML and JSON.
Updated to support URL inputs to the tool.
Updated the report header to display the timestamp with an ISO 8601 date time format.

release.description: This release of the Core Library is a component of the integrated release 3.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added in 1000 version of the schema and schematron and set as default for this release. Inherited from core.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added the capability to perform the following file reference checks: Check that the casing of the file references match what is on the file system; Check that the generated checksums match the supplied checksums in the label, if provided. Inherited from the core library.
Added in 0310b version of the schema and schematron and set as default for this release. Inherited from core.
Bundled in DTD for 1.1 catalog. This allows doctypes to be specified in catalog files. Inherited from core.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated to support the v09 data model. This includes no longer crawling a bundle or collection to look for file references.
Updated version information to also display the default schema and schematron files being used during validation.
Added in 0300a version of schema and schematron and set as default for this release. Inherited from core.
Fixed the report header to display the correct core schema and schematron being used when validating against an older version of the data model.
Fixed an issue that caused schematron to not be loaded internally when user supplied schema file(s) were given. Inherited from core.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added a -S, --schematron flag option to be able to specify schematron files to use during validation.
Added in 0800k version of schema and schematron and set as default for this release. Inherited from core.
Added in 0700j version of schema and schematron. Inherited from core.
Updated xpath expressions to support the latest changes to the PDS4 data model.
Updated to provide a better mechanism for determining the product type of a target in order to determine appropriate crawling behavior.
Fixed to rely on the field_location and field_length attributes instead of commas to parse an inventory table file.
Removed the Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for release changes.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added support for XSD 1.1 and XML Catalogs. Inherited from core.
Added a -C, --catalog flag option to be able to specify catalogs to use during validation.
Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added support to validate against older versions of the PDS4 data model.
Fixed to support crawling of all bundle class types.
Fixed a bug where the Validate Tool did not correctly crawl a collection or bundle when validating multiple targets of different types during a single executable run.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Added in the 0411f version of the schemas and set this as the default for the release. Inherited from core.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 1.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Added in the 0300A version of the schemas and set this as the default for the release. Inherited from core.

release.description: This release of the Validate Tool is a component of the integrated release 1.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards.
release.action: Add capability to validate a product label or directory containing product labels. Validation capabilities provided by the Core Library.
Add capability to validate against a user-specified schema instead of the internal, default schemas used by the tool. Internal set of XML Schemas provided by the Core Library.
Add capability to disable directory recursion.
Add capability to optionally set the tool behaviors through a configuration file.
Add capability to specify file filters to search for specific files in a target directory.
